member.name: IP_ADDR_STRING
member.summary: TheIP_ADDR_STRING structure represents a node in a linked-list of IPv4 addresses.

member.name: IP_ADDR_STRING.Next
member.summary: A pointer to the nextIP_ADDR_STRING structure in the list.

member.name: IP_ADDR_STRING.IpAddress
member.summary: A value that specifies a structure type with a single member, String. The String member is a char array of size 16. This array holds an IPv4 address in dotted decimal notation.

member.name: IP_ADDR_STRING.IpMask
member.summary: A value that specifies a structure type with a single member, String. The String member is a char array of size 16. This array holds the IPv4 subnet mask in dotted decimal notation.

member.name: IP_ADDR_STRING.Context
member.summary: A network table entry (NTE). This value corresponds to the NTEContext parameters in the and functions.
